com.DivineInspiration.experimenter.Controller

Class TrialManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • java.util.ArrayList<Trial>
          • com.DivineInspiration.experimenter.Controller.TrialManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Trial>, java.util.Collection<Trial>, java.util.List<Trial>, java.util.RandomAccess

    public class TrialManager
extends java.util.ArrayList<Trial>
    This class talks to the FireStore database in order to store and retrieve trial data. The class uses singleton pattern.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  TrialManager.OnTrialListReadyListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when TrialManager successfully queries a list of Trial from Firestore
      static interface  TrialManager.OnTrialReadyListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when TrialManager successfully queries an Trial from Firestore

        Queries the trials that performed for a given experiment
